words.prompt: Something _____________ is usual or normal for that person, thing, or group
To _____________ is to stick closely.
To _____________ is to mix with a liquid and become part of the liquid.
Something _____________ contains very small bits of sand or stone.
_____________ means “moist” or “full of water vapor.”
To _____________ is to make something look bigger than it really is.
A _____________ is a device for looking at things that are too small to be seen with the naked eye.
To _____________ is to mix or come together.
To _____________ means to turn or spin around rapidly
_____________ means hard to please and picky.
To _____________ means to say or show something.
To _____________ means to surround or form a circle around.
An _____________ is a strong feeling such as love, hate, happiness, sorrow, or fear.
A _____________ is a bunch of picked flowers.
_____________ are pictures of people, usually showing only the face and upper part of the body.
Something that _____________ shines in quick, bright flashes.
To _____________ something is to discover it, or make it known.
Something that is _____________ is very large or great.
To _____________ something means to keep a record.
_____________ is the study of the way humans lived a long time ago.
An _____________ is a period of time in history, often starting with an important event.
_____________ is proof of something.
An _____________ is a journey made for a particular reason.
To be _____________ means to last a long time without changing.
